main.eval:
import os import stack.roll
g = stack.roll.Generator()
if os.path.exists('/tmp/rolls.xml'): g.parse('/tmp/rolls.xml') elif os.path.exists('/tmp/pallets.xml'): g.parse('/tmp/pallets.xml')
print g.rolls for pallet in g.rolls: (pname, pver, prel, parch, purl, pdiskid) = pallet print '<repo> --name="%s" --baseurl=http://localhost/install/pallets/%s/%s/redhat/%s</repo>' % (pname, pname, pver, parch)

kickstart.post:
/opt/stack/bin/stack set host attr localhost attr=roll_install_on_the_fly value=true \ shadow=yes
/opt/stack/bin/stack set attr attr=user.auth value=unix
